thread.title: Natalie Portman Pulls a Beyoncé in James Blake's New Music Video
thread.title_full: Natalie Portman Pulls a Beyoncé in James Blake's New Music Video

title: Natalie Portman Pulls a Beyoncé in James Blake's New Music Video
text:
Natalie Portman Pulls a Beyoncé in James Blake's New Music Video 
It was shot just days before she gave birth. Most Popular By Kristina Rodulfo Mar 20, 2017 Is posing underwater while pregnant the new naked Demi Moore pose? (You know the one .) It seems so with James Blake's new music video for "My Willing Heart," which stars Natalie Portman. According to a release, Natalie shot the video, directed by Anna Rose Holmer, "just days" before her daughter Amalia's birth in February . Advertisement   This calls to mind another famous maternity shoot done under water from none other than Beyoncé, who did the same set up when she announced her pregnancy in February. Blake happens to have collaborated with Beyoncé as well on Lemonade, producing "Pray You Catch Me" and singing "Forward." GIF Most Popular "My Willing Heart" is from Blake's 2016 album The Colour in Anything and was co-written by Frank Ocean. Watch it in full, below: More from ELLE:
